data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Bianca Tamires Silva Dos, Nascimento, Agata Tyanne Silva, Fernandes, José Antônio Marin (2014): Proposition of a new species group in Edessa Fabricius, 1803 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Edessinae). Zootaxa 3774 (5): 441-459, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.5.3
